title: Bitcoin Open Interest Drops 31% as Analysts Call a Market Bottom and Eye $105k Breakout
full_text: Bitcoin Open Interest Drops 31% as Analysts Call a Market Bottom and Eye $105k Breakout. Bitcoin open interest has plunged over 31% from its 2025 peak, now stabilizing around $10 billion as analysts identify this decline as a critical bottoming....
